body: I still think that having `Code` being agnostic of `computes_on_variables` is a better idea. I'd rather keep them having values of `VariableType`, and make unwraping the responsibility of `GraphExecutor` when it isolates white-box subgraphs.
body_html: I still think that having Code being agnostic of computes_on_variables is a better idea. I'd rather keep them having values of VariableType, and make unwraping the responsibility of GraphExecutor when it isolates white-box subgraphs.
body_text: I still think that having Code being agnostic of computes_on_variables is a better idea. I'd rather keep them having values of VariableType, and make unwraping the responsibility of GraphExecutor when it isolates white-box subgraphs.
